prompt:
Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth to us and its potential value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional item. This offer aims to provide you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special while also ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
